âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Small size (under 5MB) â€¢ Cross-platform support (Mac, Windows, Linux, Android, iOS) â€¢ Rust Tauri based â€¢ GitHub Actions for cloud-based packaging â€¢ Custom JavaScript injection
ðŸ“– Summary: PakePlus is a tool for converting web pages and web applications into native desktop and mobile apps. It leverages Rust Tauri to create small, fast applications with features like custom JavaScript injection and cross-platform support. PakePlus offers both cloud-based and local packaging options, making it easy to create applications without complex local dependencies.
